name: Bête Noire
description:
You have awoken in a large and somewhat mysterious house with a throbbing headache. You have in your possession a small used flashlight with questionable batteries. You must find out what happened to you and ultimately escape the house to seek attention for your life.

Along your journey you will find items that explain what has happened to you and will require you to keep your sanity in check. Light is your best friend and will allow you to solve puzzles and explore the house you have found yourself lost in.

Core features
  • Procedural built levels, including procedural placement of room items
  • Dynamic light detection system that influences the player characters sanity
  • Freak-out game mechanic as a unique take on saving checkpoints
  • Player character abilities, such as drawing a path to finding loot-able containers
Minimum system requirements
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • CPU: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • System memory: 4 GB
  • GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB installation size
  • Input device: Xbox one controller OR keyboard and mouse
